Html:
Hi, Can someone please tell how can I use QuickGraph to generate an image from .dot file? (C#)

Thanks
You have to use Graphviz (http://www.graphviz.org/) dot tool. QuickGraph only creates dot files for Graphviz.
To clarify, QuickGraph will create the intermediate file (with .dot extension) for you. Graphviz will then use that file to generate the image.
